Interface PlaceManagerSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface PlaceManagerSpec

Specification of services offer by a place manager.

                          java.lang.String parent)
Add a new place to the hash map.

Parameters:
name - the place name
parent - the parent id of this place, or null if this place is a root
Returns:
the id of the new place null otherwise.

moveObject

boolean moveObject(java.lang.String objId,
                   java.lang.String oldPlaceID,
                   java.lang.String newPlaceID)
Move a core object to a specify place. If newPalceID attribute equal -1 the object is just removed from this place

Parameters:
objId - the core object identifier to move
oldPlaceID - the source place of the core object
newPlaceID - the destination place of the core object
Returns:
true if the device has moved, false otherwise
